 ************************************************************************/

#include <cmath>
#include <string>
#include <cstdio>
#include <fstream>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
/*Let's fight!!!*/

int dp[10][40002];
int arr[4000];

int main(void) {
  	int len, cc, sum;
	for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) dp[i][0] = 1;
	for (int i = 0; i < 4001; i++) dp[1][i] = 1;
	for (int i = 2; i < 10; i++) {
	  	len = arr[0] = 1;
	  	cc = 0;
	 	for (int j = 1; j <= 4000; j++) {
		  	sum = 0; for (int k = 0; k < len; k++) {
	  			int tmp = arr[k] * i + cc;	
				arr[k] = tmp % 10;
				cc = tmp / 10;
				sum += arr[k];
			}
			if ( cc ) arr[len++] = cc, sum += cc, cc = 0;
			dp[i][j] = sum;
		}
	}
	int t, cas = 1;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while ( t-- ) {
	  	int a, b;
		scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);
		printf("Case %d: %d\n", cas++, dp[a][b]);
	}

	return 0;
}
